quote: I knew what Charley would do. He would spend the evening drinking himself into the mindset of a cinder block. If they had given him as much as a hundred bucks, it would be a long night.
quote_letters: I KNEW WHAT CHARLEY WOULD DO HE WOULD SPEND THE EVENING DRINKING HIMSELF INTO THE MINDSET OF A CINDER BLOCK IF THEY HAD GIVEN HIM AS MUCH AS A HUNDRED BUCKS IT WOULD BE A LONG NIGHT
